course_description: This course will examine: (1) the origin and spread of cancer; (2) cancer cell metabolism; (3) the genetic features of cancer cells; (4) chromatin and epigenetic architecture of cancer cells; (5) cancer immunology; and (6) cancer prevention and treatments.
prerequisites: [(BIOL 142 and BIOL 142L) or BIOL_OX 142] and [BIOL 223 or BIOL 250 or BIOL 264 or BIOL_OX 264] or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisites.
sections: Class Nbr: 1703, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: J. Thakur, Status: Open
